text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا

translation.en.sahih: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
translation.id.indonesian: Pada hari mereka melihat hari berbangkit itu, mereka merasa seakan-akan tidak tinggal (di dunia) melainkan (sebentar saja) di waktu sore atau pagi hari.
